item.description:
I'm planning to do the East Bay bike path this Saturday, the 19th of September, at 9:15AM, starting from Bristol, RI.

This will be a bike path ride - no streets, no cars, no worries. As usual, our speed on the bike path will be *significantly slower* than our when we ride on roads.

If it is raining â€“ I will reschedule for another day.

The East Bay bike path is 14.5 miles of paved bike path from Bristol to Providence.

Meet us at Colt State Park in Bristol, Rhode Island.

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE remember to take my cell phone number: 401-699-7304 in case you can't find us. As usual, I will be sporting my signature red road bike.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red road bike. Try my cell: 401-699-7304.
item.name: East Bay Bike path - 29 miles, SLOW PACE
